chapters.title: Chapter 9: To Die Well
chapters.info: Kalyan Ramsin, p. 215—One of Tenobia's uncles. He is scarred and grizzled, has a face like an eagle, and thick mustaches. He has an eye for Ethenielle, but she took her time in determining whether she should take notice of it. She has since married him. Since Kalyan left to be with his new bride, Tenobia's headstrong streaks have loomed large. See also Bashere, Davram t'Ghaline; Kazadi, Tenobia si Bashere; Kirukan Materasu, Ethenielle.
